info.title: Catalog API Multi-language
info.description:
The Catalog API Multi-language allows you to manage language-specific translations for various catalog entities at VTEX. This API enables merchants to provide localized content for products, SKUs, categories, brands, specifications, collections, and related entities across different languages and locales.

With this API, you can create, update, and retrieve translations for catalog content, making it easier to serve international customers with content in their preferred language. The API supports multiple catalog entities and provides a consistent interface for managing translations.

>ℹ️ This API is part of the VTEX Catalog Beta program for multi-language support.

## Common use cases

- **Internationalization**: Provide product information in multiple languages for global storefronts.
- **Content localization**: Translate product names, descriptions, and metadata for different regions.
- **Multilingual catalogs**: Maintain separate translations for products, categories, and brands across different locales.
- **Regional customization**: Adapt product information for specific markets and languages.

## Index

### Product

- [Get product translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/product/-productId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves language-specific information for a product.
- [Update product translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/product/-productId-/language): Updates or inserts language-specific information for a product.
- [Get product specification translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/products/-productId-/specification/-specificationId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a product specification.
- [Update product specification translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/products/-productId-/specification/-specificationId-/language): Updates translations for a product specification.

### SKU

- [Get SKU translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/stockkeepingunit/-skuId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves language-specific information for a SKU.
- [Update SKU translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/stockkeepingunit/-skuId-/language): Updates or inserts language-specific information for a SKU.
- [Get SKU file translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/stockkeepingunit/-skuId-/file/-skuFileId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a SKU file/image.
- [Update SKU file translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/stockkeepingunit/-skuId-/file/-skuFileId-/language): Updates translations for a SKU file/image.
- [Get SKU attribute translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/stockkeepingunit/-skuId-/attribute/-skuAttributeId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a SKU attribute.
- [Update SKU attribute translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/stockkeepingunit/-skuId-/attribute/-skuAttributeId-/language): Updates translations for a SKU attribute.

### Specification

- [Get specification group translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/specificationgroup/-specificationGroupId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a specification group.
- [Update specification group translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/specificationgroup/-specificationGroupId-/language): Updates translations for a specification group.
- [Get specification translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/specification/-specificationId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a specification.
- [Update specification translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/specification/-specificationId-/language): Updates translations for a specification.
- [Get specification value translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/specificationvalue/-valueId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a specification value.
- [Update specification value translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/specificationvalue/-valueId-/language): Updates translations for a specification value.

### Category

- [Get category translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/category/-categoryId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves language-specific information for a category.
- [Update category translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/category/-categoryId-/language): Updates or inserts language-specific information for a category.

### Brand

- [Get brand translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/brand/-brandId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves language-specific information for a brand.
- [Update brand translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/brand/-brandId-/language): Updates or inserts language-specific information for a brand.

### Collection

- [Get collection translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/collection/-collectionId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves language-specific information for a collection.
- [Update collection translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/collection/-collectionId-/language): Updates or inserts language-specific information for a collection.

### Attachment and service

- [Get attachment translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/attachment/-attachmentId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for an attachment.
- [Update attachment translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/attachment/-attachmentId-/language): Updates translations for an attachment.
- [Get SKU service translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/skuservice/-skuserviceId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a SKU service.
- [Update SKU service translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/skuservice/-skuserviceId-/language): Updates translations for a SKU service.
- [Get SKU service type translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/skuservicetype/-skuServiceTypeId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a SKU service type.
- [Update SKU service type translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/skuservicetype/-skuServiceTypeId-/language): Updates translations for a SKU service type.
- [Get SKU service value translations](#get-/api/catalog/pvt/skuservicevalue/-skuServiceValueId-/language/-locale-): Retrieves translations for a SKU service value.
- [Update SKU service value translations](#put-/api/catalog/pvt/skuservicevalue/-skuServiceValueId-/language): Updates translations for a SKU service value.

### Collection
XXXX

## Common parameters

| Parameter name | Description | Type |
| - | - | - |
| `{{accountName}}` | Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL. | Server variable |
| `{{environment}}` | Environment to use. Used as part of the URL. The default value is `vtexcommercestable`. | Server variable |
| `X-VTEX-API-AppKey` | Unique identifier of the [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys). | Authentication header. Must be used together with `X-VTEX-API-AppToken`. Not necessary when using `VtexIdclientAutCookie`. |
| `X-VTEX-API-AppToken` | Secret token of the [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys). | Authentication header. Must be used together with `X-VTEX-API-AppKey`. Not necessary when using `VtexIdclientAutCookie`. |
| `VtexIdclientAutCookie` | [User token](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-user-tokens), valid for 24 hours. | Authentication header. Not necessary when using `X-VTEX-API-AppKey` and `X-VTEX-API-AppToken`. |
| `locale` | The locale code to filter translations by (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`). When specified in GET requests, only translations for that locale are returned. When omitted, all translations are returned. | Query/Path parameter |

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

get.description:
Retrieves language-specific information for a given product. You can optionally filter by locale to get translations for a specific language.

## Permissions

Any user or [application key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-application-keys) must have at least one of the appropriate [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3) to be able to successfully run this request. Otherwise they will receive a status code `403` error. These are the applicable resources for this endpoint:

| **Product** | **Category** | **Resource** |
| - | - | - |
| Catalog | Content | **Categories Management** |

put.description:

Content-Type.name: Content-Type
Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.name: Accept
Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

SpecificationGroupId.name: specificationGroupId
SpecificationGroupId.description: Unique identifier of the specification group.

ValueId.name: valueId
ValueId.description: Unique identifier of the specification value.

SkuFileId.name: skuFileId
SkuFileId.description: Unique identifier of the SKU file/image.

SkuAttributeId.name: skuAttributeId
SkuAttributeId.description: Unique identifier of the SKU attribute.

SkuServiceId.name: skuserviceId
SkuServiceId.description: Unique identifier of the SKU service.

SkuServiceTypeId.name: skuServiceTypeId
SkuServiceTypeId.description: Unique identifier of the SKU service type.

SkuServiceValueId.name: skuServiceValueId
SkuServiceValueId.description: Unique identifier of the SKU service value.

Locale.name: locale
Locale.description: The locale code to filter translations by (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`). When omitted, all translations are returned.

ProductLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a product.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

description.example: A comfortable cotton t-shirt in classic blue color

title.description: Translated title of the product for SEO purposes.

metaTagDescription.description: Translated meta tag description for SEO.
metaTagDescription.example: Buy the best classic blue t-shirt made with premium cotton

descriptionShort.description: Translated short description of the product.

linkId.description: Translated URL-friendly identifier for the product.

SkuLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a SKU.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

measurementUnit.description: Localized measurement unit for the SKU.

CategoryLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a category.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

title.description: Translated title of the category for SEO purposes.

description.example: Discover our collection of men's clothing

linkId.description: Translated URL-friendly identifier for the category.

BrandLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a brand.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

text.description: Translated text description of the brand.

siteTitle.description: Translated site title for the brand.

linkId.description: Translated URL-friendly identifier for the brand.

CollectionLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a collection.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

linkId.description: Translated URL-friendly identifier for the collection.

SpecificationGroupLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a specification group.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

name.description: Translated name of the specification group.

SpecificationLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a specification.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

SpecificationValueLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a specification value.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

name.description: Translated name of the specification value.

isCustomValue.description: Indicates if this is a custom value.

ProductSpecificationLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a product specification.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

name.description: Translated name of the product specification.

value.description: Translated value of the product specification.

AttachmentLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for an attachment.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

SkuFileLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a SKU file/image.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

label.description: Translated label for the SKU file.

name.description: Translated name of the SKU file.

text.description: Translated text description of the file.

SkuAttributeLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a SKU attribute.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

attributeName.description: Translated name of the SKU attribute.

attributeValue.description: Translated value of the SKU attribute.

SkuServiceLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a SKU service.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

name.description: Translated name of the SKU service.

text.description: Translated description of the SKU service.
text.example: Add gift wrapping to your order

SkuServiceTypeLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a SKU service type.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

name.description: Translated name of the SKU service type.

SkuServiceValueLanguageDto.description: Object containing language-specific information for a SKU service value.

id.description: Unique identifier of the translation record.

locale.description: The locale code for this translation (e.g., `en-US`, `pt-BR`, `es-ES`).

name.description: Translated name of the SKU service value.
